The food was very good.  I had the roasted vegetables with goat cheese appetizer.  The flavors were varied and it tasted delicious. I also had the vegetable paella which was also very good The baked sea bass was amazing.  It so well seasoned and the potatoes on top seemed to be baked with it in all the wonderful seasonings.I will definitely be back the next time I'm in Spain.  The catalan creme Brulee was not warm.  It tasted okay.  I wouldn't order the brulee again.  If it weren't for the long wait to be acknowledged and seated the second time I was there,  even though there were plenty of empty chairs, they would have received five stars.
